markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 4"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Alchemical Discoveries](/Feats.aspx?ID=1456) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Investigator" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=318" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 61 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
[alchemical sciences methodology](/Methodologies.aspx?ID=1)

</column>

---

You've devoted extra time in the lab to improve your knowledge of alchemy. You learn the formulas for two alchemical items each time you level up instead of one; these must still be [elixirs](/equipment/alchemical-items/alchemical-elixirs) or [tools](/equipment/alchemical-items/alchemical-tools). The number of versatile vials you can create each day increases by 1 if you're an expert in [Crafting](/Skills.aspx?ID=4), 2 if you're a master, or 3 if you're legendary.
name: Alchemical Discoveries

text: <title level="1" right="Feat 4" pfs="Standard" > Alchemical Discoveries Source Advanced Player's Guide pg. 61 2.0 Prerequisites alchemical sciences methodology --- You've devoted extra time in the lab to improve your knowledge of alchemy. You learn the formulas for two alchemical items each time you level up instead of one; these must still be elixirs or tools. The number of versatile vials you can create each day increases by 1 if you're an expert in Crafting, 2 if you're a master, or 3 if you're legendary.
